title: Sardines soon available at Foundry VetteLetters
content:
Sardines, an original fat monospaced and square typeface. After being used for private and exclusive purposes only, Sardines has now a full characterset (ASE) and will soon be made available at **[Vette Letters](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123135633/http:/www.vetteletters.nl/)**

<cite>’… an amusing parade of heavyweight characters crammed into squares.’</cite>  
(Jan Middendorp, Dutch Type, 2004)

Used as title face in the first restyled issue (2004) of the dutch design magazine _Items._

// Jacques

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123135633im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Sardines_Web_02_3694.png)
author: fonthausen

comments.content:
Nice.

I don't speak Dutch -- can the fonts be purchased from VetteLetters.nl?

I've been waiting for Sardines since I first saw the Sardines Light specimen on your website, years ago…  
Tell us when we'll be able to purchase it!

<cite>I’ve been waiting for Sardines since I first saw the Sardines Light specimen on your website, years ago…</cite>

;-)

Thanx

To be honest, I had to be convinced by some friends of mine to finally publish it !  
I tend to make typefaces for my own use and 'forget' to publish them...

// Jacques

Hij's vet! ;)

(It's great)

Kind regards,  
Martijn
